topics.body:
Alright! Two volumes of Gash Bell down!
And they were a good solid two volumes that showed the world and it's rules, introduced us to the main characters, and established their realtionship to each other. As I said before a Kiyomaro is somewhat of a black sheep in regards to shonen protagonists. Where as most shonen protags are basically Luff/Goku/Naruto in that they are dumb, happy, and hot-headed, Kiyo is cool, smart collected. He thinks about the best way to beat an opponent. I especially like the chapter about Koruru because it gave Gash a stake in this big dumb fight.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
